title: Three Cards Remain

atmosphere.description: The entire dimension holds its breath

nexus_supporters.internal_debate: Who gets the honor of minting 100?
nexus_supporters.nexus_statement: Three more steps. THREE. We've come so far.

cipher_fans.cipher_statement: The data set is nearly complete. Beautiful.

echo_traders.echo_statement: Get out now. GET OUT NOW. There's still time.

muse_admirers.artistic_insight: This moment, right now, is the real masterpiece
muse_admirers.muse_statement: Look at them all. Look at what the prophecy has made of us.

moment_1.event: Nexus supporter's hand trembled over mint button for card 98
moment_1.outcome: Hesitation. Someone else asked 'Should we slow down?'
moment_1.significance: First doubt in the acceleration faction

moment_2.event: Echo trader collapsed, muttering about market exposure
moment_2.outcome: Carried away by faction members, trading continued
moment_2.significance: The cost of treating prophecy as pure finance

moment_3.event: Cipher delivered a formula: C = D/R where C is compression, D is data, R is redundancy
moment_3.significance: Seeking meaning in mathematics at the edge of mystery

moment_4.event: Complete silence fell across all faction spaces
moment_4.significance: The collective inhale before the final sprint

the_question_nobody_is_asking: What have we already made happen?

meta.self_fulfilling_status: The prophecy has already succeeded. Whatever happens at 100, the Great Compression has already compressed everyone's attention, behavior, and meaning into this single point.
